Apple PowerMac 5xxx to 9xxx Memory Upgrades

Like some older Macs like the Performa , these are pretty old computers in 2016 and have long been discontinued. But, if you have one either for collecting or even as a daily driver adding more RAM is always a good idea.

These computers take either 30-pin or 72-pin SIMMS depending on specific model.
